item.title: The New York Times Wants You to Feel Sorry for the Coldplay HR Executive. HR Professionals Can’t
item.description: Human resources leaders need to hold themselves to consistent high standards, and that’s why the kiss cam couple is no longer working for Astronomer.

item.title: Tariffs Have Forced Costco to Make a Huge Pivot for Holiday Shoppers

item.title: A Battery Startup Raised $330 Million on the Promise of Charging EVs in 5 Minutes—It Just Filed for Bankruptcy
item.description: Ample filed for bankruptcy protection amid broader EV industry turmoil, but it isn’t the first battery swapping startup to fail.
